alert.note: Alert for East Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:20AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern East Carroll Parish, southern Washington, Issaquena and Sharkey Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1020 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Lake Providence to 6 miles south of Fitler. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grace and Glen Allan around 1030 AM CDT. Nitta Yuma around 1035 AM CDT. Panther Burn and Delta City around 1040 AM CDT. Hollandale, Rolling Fork, Anguilla and Estill around 1045 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mayersville, Arcola and Cary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and west central Mississippi.
